revisions.rev:
'''[[Gibraltar]]''' is a self-governing British Overseas Territory, located to the north of the Strait of Gibraltar.
'''Gibraltar''' may also refer to:
{{TOC right}}
==Places == === Europe === * [[Bay of Gibraltar]], the area of sea to the West of the Gibraltar Strait * [[Campo de Gibraltar]], a Spanish ''comarca'' and former municipal term and hinterland of the town of Gibraltar * [[Gibraltar, Buckinghamshire]], England * Gibraltar Hole, the 10th hole of the Golf Course in [[Moortown, West Yorkshire]], UK built in 1908 * [[Gibraltar Mill, Great Bardfield]], a windmill now converted to residential use * [[Gibraltar Point]] National Nature Reserve, in Lincolnshire, England * [[Monemvasia]], a Greek peninsula and fortress, has been called the Gibraltar of the East * [[Rock of Gibraltar]], a monolithic rock formation on the European side of the strait * [[Strait of Gibraltar]], at the western end of the Mediterranean Sea * ''La LÃ­nea de Gibraltar'', the original name of ''[[La LÃ­nea de la ConcepciÃ³n]]'' in Spain
=== The Americas === * [[Gibraltar, Michigan]] * [[Gibraltar, Pennsylvania]] * [[Gibraltar, Venezuela]] * [[Gibraltar, Wisconsin]] * [[Gibraltar Building]], in Newark, New Jersey * [[Gibraltar Island]] in Ohio * [[Gibraltar Mountain]], a peak in the Canadian Rockies in Alberta * "Gibraltar of the South", an alias for [[Fort Fisher]] * "Gibraltar of the West Indies", and alias for [[Brimstone Hill]] Fortress in Saint Kitts and Nevis
=== Australia === * [[Gibraltar Range National Park]], New South Wales, Australia
== Film == * [[Gibraltar (1938 film)|''Gibraltar'' (1938 film)]] * [[Gibraltar (1964 film)|''Gibraltar'' (1964 film)]] * [[Gibraltar (2011 film)|''Gibraltar'' (2011 film)]], a [[List of African films#Rwanda|Rwanda]]n documentary film * Rocky Gibraltar, a [[List of Toy Story characters#Rocky Gibraltar|character from the ''Toy Story'' film series]]
== History == * [[Battle of Gibraltar]], a naval battle that took place in 1607 * {{HMS|Gibraltar}}, the name of seven ships of the Royal Navy * [[Kingdom of Gibraltar]], one of the historic substantive titles pertaining to the Spanish monarchy * [[Marquisate of Gibraltar]], a short-lived Castilian nobility title * [[Operation Gibraltar]], a Pakistan plan to infiltrate Jammu and Kashmir in 1965
== Music == * ''Gibraltar'', a 2006 recording from French rapper [[Abd al Malik (rapper)]] * [[Gibraltar Hardware]] Drum Hardware Manufacturer
== Religion == * The [[Diocese of Gibraltar in Europe]] (Anglican) * The [[Roman Catholic Diocese of Gibraltar]]
== Science == * Gibraltar candytuft ([[Iberis gibraltarica]]), a plant endemic to Gibraltar * [[Gibraltar (operating system)]], a Linux based Firewall
== Other uses == * [[Gibraltar rock (candy)]], hard candy associated with Salem, Massachusetts * Camp Gibraltar, a fictional refugee camp in North Africa, appearing in the video game ''[[Battlefield 2142]]''
